name: Silent North
summary:
Silent North is in Early Access Alpha!

In a post-apocalyptic world within the Swiss Alps, the land is in the overrun with the infected and other survivors that will treat you as friend or foe. Will you survive as a lone wolf, or make new bonds with strangers? Can you withstand the Silent North?

LONE WOLF OR GROUP UP
{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}
Players must survive the north using anything at their disposal. You can fight as a lone wolf in the wild or with friends in a home. Every...
